column2: 2015 vedder - donald d. of east aurora
column5: belovedhusband of the lateossi (riegel) vedder; survived by son victorl. (janet) vedder
column9: mary lou. vedder; brother allan vedder andgrandson geoffrey d. (courtney)vedder. arrangements by comfortfuneral home inc. privateservices were held. donald was a proudkorean war veteran. condolences atwww. comfortfuneralhome. com
